title: Regulations 2021 are amended, in Regulation 8, by the insertion after paragraph
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Avian Influenza (Temporary
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Avian Influenza (Temporary 

Measures) (No.2) (Amendment) Regulations 2021.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited avian influenza (temporary measures) (no.2) (amendment) regulation 2021

title: Regulations 2021 are amended, in Regulation 8, by the insertion after paragraph
heading: 2. The Avian Influenza (Temporary Measures) (No.2) (Amendment)
text_raw:
2. The Avian Influenza (Temporary Measures) (No.2) (Amendment) 
Regulations 2021 are amended, in Regulation 8, by the insertion after paragraph 
(2) of- 

“(3) A licence granted under the Regulations revoked by Regulation 
14 that is in force immediately before the making of these Regulations 
remains in force, is deemed to have been granted under the corresponding 
provision of these Regulations and may be dealt with in accordance with 
paragraph (2).”. 

GIVEN the Official Seal of the Minister for Agriculture, Food 
and the Marine, 

26 November, 2021. 

JUNE FANNING, 

An officer authorised to authenticate the Seal of the 
Minister. 

1 O.J, L 174 of 3.6.2020, 64; http://data.europa.eu/eli/reg_del/2020/687/oj 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 30th November, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [622] 3
